txt.en: Talk to Ordlac in the Mead Hall of Oserley
You defeated the villain responsible for the plot against LÃºfa, despite the threats within the marshes.
'Thane Ordlac will want to thank you for your services himself, I am sure. He awaits you in the Mead Hall...do not keep him waiting long, for his summons arrived before you.'
'Ah! Welcome back, my friend! I must thank you for saving my dear wife and putting an end to the brigand threat!\n\n'Your efforts were unexpectedly valiant and deserving of this reward.'
Thane Ordlac is in the Mead Hall of Oserley.\n\nDudsig instructed you to return at once to Thane Ordlac.
